Fix Vercel deployment and cleanup project

- Add vercel.json with production environment variables
- Configure REACT_APP_API_URL for production deployment
- Remove all unnecessary documentation files (.md, .txt)
- Remove development batch/shell scripts (.bat, .sh)
- Remove HTML and Postman collection files
- Update README.md with deployment instructions
- Clean project structure for production deployment

This fixes the "Cannot connect to server" error on Vercel by properly
configuring the API URL to use https://stagev2.appletechlabs.com/api
instead of localhost:8011/proxy/api
